author: Obi-Wan3
description: Various tools for managing custom emojis in servers.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. If enabled, the `[p]emojitools save` command group saves to folders in the cog data path image files of emojis that server administrators select.
install_msg: Thank you for installing. Use `[p]help emojitools` for more info. **IMPORTANT**: The `[p]emojitools save` command group will allow server admins to save emojis to folders in the cog data path, which they can upload to Discord as a `.zip` archive at any time. The folders will be accessible to admin across all servers with access to this cog. For large public bots, it is highly recommended to restrict usage of or disable the `[p]emojitools save` command group. The other cog features do **NOT** require permanent storage but do result in temporary files, with some IO usage.
